attributes.action: stop using motorists as a cash cow
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Motorists are being hit with tax after tax after tax. 

£120 tax.
Ever rising fuel duty.
Rising VAT is coming on fuel.
Congestion Charges.
Emissions Charges.
Parking Fines.

Whats your excuse? The environment. ON a planet which undergoes natural change, ice ages and heat cycles, does this really seem like a good reason?

Is public transport cheap and reliable as an alternative? No.

We are not an inexhaustible MasterCard with no credit limit.

We are feeling the pinch Gordon.

rejection.details:
There are a number of other petitions already in existence that you may wish to add your name to:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Motorists-speak
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/MotoristsFuel
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/MultipleCarTax
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
